casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Steven B. TRAINER, a/k/a Steve Johnson, Steven Johnson, Steven B. Johnson, Steven Trainor, Steven B. Trainor, Bruce Turner, Bruce S. Turner, Steven Grainor, Greg Trainer, Gregory Trainer, Gregory Arthur Trainer, Stephen Trainer, Steven Trainers, Bob Turner, Defendant-Petitioner. C-734 September Term 2017
080370 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 23, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002378-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
